bibl.title: New Data from the Zenon Papyri.
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: Aly, Zaki

bibl.note: Egyptian Papyrological Society Cairo. - 1. A hypomnema to Zenon. - 2. A dated letter referring to an assignment of land among the cleruchs. Nov. 20, 253 B.C. - 3. A letter mentioning the Festival of Isis. - 4. A report of dekatarchoi on the flight of workers. - 5. A dated letter from Metrodoros. 257 B.C.
Aly Zaki, New Data from the Zenon Papyri.
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists (London, 1975) pp. 1-6 et pll. I-IV.
141.4 P. Cairo Eg. Soc. Pap. sans No. d'Inv.
